examples.translation: He also knows the answer to the question.
Oğuzhan is coming with us as well.
Yağız likes eating ice cream, too.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish ده (da, de, “conj. also, and, moreover, again”), from Proto-Turkic *tākı (“conj. and”), whence daha and dahi. Cognate with Azerbaijani da (“also, as well, too”), Kazakh and Kyrgyz да (da, “also, as well, too”).
